law.catch_line: The Board shall issue the appropriate license to any applicant who meets the requirements of this ti...

text.section: The Board shall issue the appropriate license to any applicant who meets the requirements of this title for that license.

section.section:
On a limited license to practice dentistry, the Board also shall include:
The date the license expires, for a license that expires on the first anniversary of its effective date; and
The name of the institution or public health program at which the licensee is authorized to practice dentistry.
On a teacher's license to practice dentistry, the Board also shall include the name of the college or university at which the licensee is a full-time or part-time faculty member.
On a teacher's license to practice dental hygiene, the Board also shall include the name of the dental school at which the licensee is a full-time or part-time faculty member.

text.section: The Board shall issue a license to replace a lost or destroyed license if the licensee pays a fee set by the Board that approximates the actual cost of replacing the license.
